OOC Don't convince me, According to Phobias ideas Starscream is still the p=
owermad, megalomaniac he once was.

BIC If The spider had it's way Starscre=
am would challenge the right to lead. If successful he'd remain at Starscre=
ams side. If not then he'd lead the others against him and gain control of =
the next puppet.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@...=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, November 30, 2000 5:37 AM
  S=
ubject: Re: A Bright Spark Fades-and Megatron takes charge.


  OOC: Cyberw=
olf, Starscream isnt power hungry anymore, ever since he became 
  secretly=
 in love with KitKat.  He and Drillbit are leaving the Predacons. 

  :::St=
arscream::: 

  Starscream: Very well then.  But you havent seen the last o=
f me, let me tell 
  you that. 
  ::He hears Drillbit's words and smiles:: =

  Starscream: Good.  Megatron will die sometime, if its by my hand or not,=
 we 
  shall have to see.  Now who killed Kitkat? 
        eGroups Sponsor =
